about me

bits and bytes...

BIO

Full Stack MERN developer and heavy believer in framework agnosticism. I have experience with the following: JavaScript, React, VueJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, FireBase, MS SQL Server, SQL, HTML, CSS, SASS, AWS, Lambda, Serverless, Netlify, GoLang, NPM, Yarn, Webpack and bundlers, Command Line, Version Control (Git, etc), and Jest testing. I am PSM1 Scrum certified (agile) and am working to finish my PSD certification.

Toys R Us

Logistics Data and Inventory Control

Worked on early inventory systems and data object modeling for store logistics and performance tracking. Built a rudimentary program for department heads to track damaged inventory and repair tickets.

Linsco Private Ledger

Broker and Data Analyst

Worked as a FINRA registered broker and financial data analyst. Built my own custom VBA scripts to manage large data sets for consumer and customer trends as well as financial instrument assessments.

Lineage Logistics

Performance Analytics and Programmer

Worked within several levels of the organization building products from truck trackers using detailed API's, to an advanced program dashboard and communication system (think Trello boards). Additionally, I oversaw and maintained programs within SAP's Vistex Module that accrued and booked millions of dollars of promotional income each year.
